title: How to Prepare Beetroot Rice

text: Steps Grate the beetroot and keep it aside.  Choose one of the two methods for cooking. If using a pressure cooker, use the Indian style that is appropriate for stove heating. Using a pressure cooker Heat the cooker on the stove. Pour oil and wait till it gets heated. Add the mustard seeds, black gram, Bengal gram and red chillies. After it spurts, add the onion. Roast till it turns a brownish color. Add the grated beetroot, then roast it. Roast and roast till the raw smell of the beetroot goes away and it turns slightly to a brown color. Add washed and cleaned rice. Pour 2 cups of water in. Add salt and curry leaves. Close the cooker with the lid and weight it. Cook. Turn off the cooker after 1 to 2 whistles. Serve. You can add washed and cleaned coriander leaves for garnishing. Using a pan Cook the rice with 2 cups of water. Keep it aside. Heat a pan and pour oil into it. After the oil is heated up, add mustard seeds, split black gram, split Bengal gram and red chillies. After it spurts, add chopped onion and saute it. Once it turns brownish, add the grated beetroot and the curry leaves. Add 1-2 teaspoon oil to roast the grated beetroot. Saute the beetroot till the raw smell goes away. Mix with the rice. Once it is ready, mix it with already cooked rice. Serve it. Garnish with coriander leaves, if wished.
